# timeouts_example (Resource)

Example resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    timeouts = {
      source = "bendbennett/timeouts"
    }
  }
}

resource "timeouts_example" "example" {
  configurable_attribute = "some-value"

  #  Block
  timeouts {
    create = "60m"
    read   = "30m"
    update = "12m"
  }

  ##  Attributes
  #  timeouts = {
  #    create = "60m"
  #    read = "30m"
  #  }
}
```

- `id` (String) Example identifier
